scoring_breakdown.viral_mechanics: 85 - Strong hook with clear value proposition
scoring_breakdown.platform_optimization: 85 - Good hashtag strategy and mobile format

reel_analysis.primary_strengths: Problem identification hook (creates immediate relevance), proven solution framework (builds credibility), save-worthy format (drives engagement)
reel_analysis.framework_1: Problem-Solution-Proof: Identifies common marketing issues, provides solutions, demonstrates effectiveness. Action: Lead with specific problem statement
reel_analysis.framework_2: Hook-Educate-CTA: Strong attention grabber, educational value, clear action. Action: Use emoji and save prompt
reel_analysis.framework_3: List-Expand-Surprise: Overview of mistakes, detailed explanations, bonus insights. Action: Number items for easy consumption

scoring_breakdown.viral_mechanics: 80 - Good swipe motivation and value promise

carousel_analysis.primary_strengths: Educational hook (promises valuable frameworks), logical slide progression (easy to follow), actionable frameworks (immediately applicable)
carousel_analysis.framework_1: Hook-Educate-CTA: Promise of valuable information, educational delivery, engagement prompt. Action: Create curiosity with slide count
carousel_analysis.framework_2: Educational-Sequential: Step-by-step framework breakdown with examples. Action: Use consistent visual design
carousel_analysis.framework_3: Value-Stack-Apply: Multiple frameworks presented, implementation guidance. Action: End with summary and application
